name: Daniella Monger
desc: Cody was wonderful - there was a bad leak on our freezer and he was here the next day and it was fixed within an hour. He was early and communicated well, it was great service!

name: Jose Castro
desc: Cody was absolutely efficient and knowledgeable when it it came to our dryer , longer story short it needed replacements  on a few pieces on the rolling assembly and he had the parts on hand and was able to repair what was need and he taught me a lot of things I didn’t no about these appliances as a business owner myself I appreciate when someone is able to communicate to me about products and services so i am able to understand things more better, thank you Cody(owner) and master tech appliances for helping me out  ! Now I can wash both my business supplies and my own families cloths with a good dryer I have 3 boys so I definitely need it!

name: Neon Crane Trent
desc: Very personable and professional at the same time.. A true craftsman who completely understands his trade and customer service relations. He did as a bang-up job for a bang-up price and we couldn't be happier! Much love Randy and April Wednesday the 30th. He will

name: Chelsea Desmarais
desc: Cody was nice enough to research the problem before making a service call and charging me money for a problem that can’t be fixed. The part I needed is no longer manufactured so can’t be replaced. Will definitely use Master Appliance Tech for any future needs.

name: Carter Armitage
desc: Cody diagnosed our problem with our old dishwasher. He ordered the part . It came in and he came out on a SUNDAY and installed it. He is very clean cut knowledgeable professional. I would use his service again.
